name: Hope (itch) (Tirupathi Rakshith)
description: You play as hope. You walk through this beautiful environment only   to realize the things are not the way they are supposed to be you move the character using A and D keys, while using the mouse to aim the popper (the weapon in the game). In the environment you see the statues called seeing eye on activating the seeing eye it reveals a evil side of the environment which was once not visible. In doing this you are able to reveals the true colors of the creatures as well as helps in revealing the popper. Using these mechanics, you are able to progress through levels. If you do kill a creature which is not revealed through the seeing eye it damages the player, so it is important to kill these creature when the true colors are revealed before the seeing eye gets destroyed, Failing to do so it will lead to the player loosing the game and restarting the level.
